Articles.Content:
Okay, with the youtube section gone now I wasn't entirely sure where to post this but figured i would throw it in here and see.

So with the expansion of my space station I decided that I needed some sort of emergency escape system for my kermans since the crew retriever can no longer hold all of them in one trip. Thus I decided to put together an escape pods system for my KVLL-01 Challenger space station. Hope you guys like it and of course I would love any crtiques/suggestion to make it better.
